expected.meta_description: A bold, new Apple TV set would replace today’s cable systems, game consoles, and 3D goggles—and launch a war with cable providers
expected.meta_keywords: Apple, Apple CEO, Google, Television, Cable & Wireless, Netflix, Steve Jobs, Comcast, cable, cable TV, hulu, Roku
expected.cleaned_text: Get ready, America, because by Christmas 2012 you will have an Apple TV in your living room
